# Mining scripts

I take no credit for these, they are simply the fabulous "nineforty#7882" scripts updated for relative coordinates.

LOC_SET_MINE (1 action) - allows impulse reuse because it will only work in the mine
`DExPQ19TRVRfTUlORQEAAAAJb3Blbi5taW5lAAAAAAEAAAAOZ2xvYmFsLmludC5zZXQIY29uc3RhbnQECGxvY2F0aW9uCGNvbnN0YW50AgIAAAA=`

ATR_MINER (12 actions, impulse on '0' when in the mine)
``

AUTO_TILER_RECURSIVE (11 actions)
